response.final_text:
I don’t have a tool named "nonexistent_tool". Available tools I can use here are:
- get_current_time — return the current date/time
- calculator — evaluate a math expression
- request_approval — ask a human for approval before a sensitive action
- multi_tool_use.parallel — run multiple of the above tools in parallel

Tell me what you want to accomplish (e.g., “get the current time,” “calculate 123*45,” or “request approval to delete X”), and I’ll call the appropriate tool(s).
